file_content.text: Your men are relying on you to get them through this. Be their example.
Stay strong, Sergeant.
Your walker must have tools or spare oxygen, something you could improvise with.
No emergency gear?
I found this datapad on a soldier's body. The rescue team didn't make it.
Your rescuers are dead.
If there's Imperials around, you'll need to move as soon as you're out.
Get your men ready to go.
Oh, at last! We're running out of air, the door's jammed too tight to--
Wait, who're you? Where's our rescue team?
Wait, who are you people? Where's our rescue team?
Our walker was attacked by Imperials, all systems are disabled--we're trapped in here, we need help!
Y--yessir. But I don't know how much longer we can hold out.
Panicking won't help.
All right. Okay. Let me think.
Give me a status report.
The Imperial squad that attacked us is still around. I can hear people outside, but no one's trying to get us out.
We used our backup gear getting civilians out of the rubble. Please, we don't have a lot of time!
Where's your walker?
Then you're the only chance we have!
The rescue team should have been carrying cutting gear. The door's jammed, there's no power. Those tools are our only way out.
Our coordinates will be in that datapad. Please, the Imperials could finish us off any minute now.
I'm coming to help.
Trust me, we're more than ready to get out of here!
Make sure you bring the tools. We'll be waiting!
I can't. [Refuse quest]
But what could be more important than--no, the signal's failing! Help! Someone--anyone!
